title: RIOT WHY IS LAG REPORT NOT AVAILABLE IN MY COUNTRY and thats not it
body:
listen about that leaver buster
i got 5 games one 
thats just retarted cause i cant report a lag report and something wrong happend i get in game(loading screen) and then it simply says recconect and i cant click 
i tried restarting but no help

replies.body:
Bronhi21,

What country are you playing from?   On the "Questions?" tab in the Lag report near the bottom, we show what countries are supported for each region.  

target1
probably because servers are so unstable overseas that it would be used almost maliciously at that point, lmao
